nodes.text: Cybernetic weapon implants were a type of cybernetic implant, and were popular among bounty hunters, assassins, and clandestine operatives. Such implants guaranteed that an individual was never unarmed no matter the situation. The artifical forearm housed a small blaster that emerged from a hidden compartment and delivered a hail of blaster fire before most enemies were aware they were in danger. The cost of a cybernetic weapon implant was 4,000 credits.
Cybernetic weapon implants were mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
